channel.title: [PI]Some Problems to Fix, Please Help :: Final Judgment Soruce!
channel.description:
[center][size=14pt]Problems to Fix:[/size][/center]
1. Skills
-Smithing when you try to smelt on the furnance (any bar) , and when you try to smith something on an anvil the client crashes, but when you log in, you actually got the xp/lvl up on smithing. What I want to fix is the crashing when Smelting/Smithing.
-Fletching when you try to cut logs with knife, string, same as Smithing, client crashes, and you recive xp/lvl up.
-Fishing I try to fix (with my fishing net on inventory) but I don't start fishing... I think im missing the fish gfx or I really don't know.
I'll post anything you need , just tell me what to do.
NOTE: I click on the furnance, select the bar then the screen goes, Loading Please Wait...then Connection Lost. ___________________________________________________________________________________________________
2. Multi zones
How do I make the Kalphite Lair Multi?, It does have the 'Multi zone sign' but you 2 can't attack. The KQ.
___________________________________________________________________________________________________
3. Weapon Staces
Well I have Chaotic Rapier, Korasi & Vesta long on my server. But I don't like the weapon stances... however the gravite rapier has the stance I want to have with chaotic rapier, korasi & vls. Where & how do I change that?
Is it client sided? and in which file?
___________________________________________________________________________________________________
4. Summoning
Does anyone know how to activate / make work the summoning botton to take out all the items of the following familiars: Spirit Terror bird War Tortise Pack-Yack
I hope you guys can help me with any of this problems.
Thanks! -Heinz

item.title: [PI]Some Problems to Fix, Please Help :: Final Judgment Soruce!
item.dc:creator: @I_am_beast I am beast
item.description:
@I_am_beast wrote:

1: Don’t know. Sorry.

2: npchandler class.
Search for:

3: combatassistant class. Search the item id.

4: Don’t know sorry.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Some Problems to Fix, Please Help :: Final Judgment Soruce!
item.dc:creator: @Arkamys Arkamys
item.description:
@Arkamys wrote:

[center][size=14pt]Problems to Fix:[/size][/center]

  1. Skills

-Smithing when you try to smelt on the furnance (any bar) , and when you try to smith something on an anvil the client crashes, but when you log in, you actually got the xp/lvl up on smithing. What I want to fix is the crashing when Smelting/Smithing.

-Fletching when you try to cut logs with knife, string, same as Smithing, client crashes, and you recive xp/lvl up.

-Fishing I try to fix (with my fishing net on inventory) but I don’t start fishing… I think im missing the fish gfx or I really don’t know.

I’ll post anything you need , just tell me what to do.

NOTE: I click on the furnance, select the bar then the screen goes, Loading Please Wait…then Connection Lost.

  1. Multi zones

How do I make the Kalphite Lair Multi?, It does have the ‘Multi zone sign’ but you 2 can’t attack. The KQ.

  1. Weapon Staces

Well I have Chaotic Rapier, Korasi & Vesta long on my server. But I don’t like the weapon stances… however the gravite rapier has the stance I want to have with chaotic rapier, korasi & vls. Where & how do I change that?

Is it client sided? and in which file?

  1. Summoning

Does anyone know how to activate / make work the summoning botton to take out all the items of the following familiars:
Spirit Terror bird
War Tortise
Pack-Yack

I hope you guys can help me with any of this problems.

Thanks!
-Heinz
